item.name: Maximum configured connections
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_VARIABLES where VARIABLE_NAME = 'max_connections';

item.name: Max number of connections ever open at the same time
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'Max_used_connections';
item.description: Max number of connections ever open at the same time.

item.name: Number of open connections
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'Threads_connected';

item.name: Wsrep: Apply Window
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_apply_window';
item.description: Average distance between highest and lowest concurrently applied seqno.

item.name: Wsrep: Cert deps distance
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_cert_deps_distance';

item.name: Wsrep: Cluster conf ID
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_cluster_conf_id';

item.name: Wsrep: Cluster Size
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_cluster_size';

item.name: Wsrep: Cluster Status
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_cluster_status';

item.name: Wsrep: Commit Window
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_commit_window';
item.description: Average distance between highest and lowest concurrently committed seqno.

item.name: Wsrep: connected
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_connected';

item.name: Wsrep: Evs State
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_evs_state';

item.name: Wsrep: Flow control paused
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_flow_control_paused';

item.name: Wsrep: Flow control received
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_flow_control_recv';

item.name: Wsrep: Flow control sent
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_flow_control_sent';

item.name: Wsrep: gcomm UUID
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_gcomm_uuid';

item.name: Wsrep: Last commited
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_last_committed';

item.name: Wsrep: Local BF Aborts
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_local_bf_aborts';
item.description: Total number of local transactions that were aborted by slave transactions while in execution.

item.name: Wsrep: Local Cert Failures
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_local_cert_failures';
item.description: Total number of local transactions that failed certification test.

item.name: Wsrep: Local receive queue
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_local_recv_queue';

item.name: Wsrep: Local send queue
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_local_send_queue';

item.name: Wsrep: Local send queue avg
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_local_send_queue_avg';

item.name: Wsrep: Local send queue max
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_local_send_queue_max';
item.description: The maximum length of the send queue since the last FLUSH STATUS command.

item.name: Wsrep: Local send queue min
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_local_send_queue_min';
item.description: The minimum length of the send queue since the last FLUSH STATUS command.

item.name: Wsrep: Local State
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_local_state';

item.name: Wsrep: Local State comment
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_local_state_comment';

item.name: Wsrep: Local State UUID
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_local_state_uuid';

item.name: Wsrep: Ready
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_ready';

item.name: Wsrep: Received
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_received';
item.description: Total number of write-sets received from other nodes.

item.name: Wsrep: Received bytes
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_received_bytes';

item.name: Wsrep: Replicated
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_replicated';
item.description: Total number of write-sets replicated (sent to other nodes).

item.name: Wsrep: Replicated Bytes
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_replicated_bytes';

item.name: Wsrep: Replicated data bytes
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_repl_data_bytes';

item.name: Wsrep: Replicated keys
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_repl_keys';

item.name: Wsrep: Replicated keys bytes
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_repl_keys_bytes';

item.name: Wsrep: Replicated other bytes
item.params: select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS where VARIABLE_NAME = 'wsrep_repl_other_bytes';

trigger.name: MySQL Maximum Number of Connections Reached on {HOST.HOST}
